availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Queen (Nelson County, KY, blacksmith and merchant)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Julia Anna Hayden Queen in Nelson County in November 1824. Father of Martha Julia Queen. Married to Mary J. Price in Nelson County on August 4, 1846. Married to Jane E. Smith in Nelson County on April 17, 1855. Father of Maria Queen and Sidney Queen. Married to Louisa Smith Queen in Nelson County on April 6, 1864. Father of Elizabeth Smith. Blacksmith in Nelson County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1850. Grocery merchant in Nelson County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860.
